title: Circular motion - period of conical pendulum

content.question: Which of the following correctly relates <math alttext="T sub 2" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>T</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msub> </math> to <math alttext="T sub 1" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>T</mi> <mn>1</mn> </msub> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="T sub 2 equals the fraction with numerator T sub 1, and denominator 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
